Matinya Mesin Penindakan KPK Setelah UU Baru Berlaku
07 Nov 2019, 08:02 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Praktis sejak 17 Oktober 2019 KPK belum memulai penyidikan baru. Alasannya Undang-Undang (UU) Nomor 19 Tahun 2019 yang merupakan aturan baru hasil revisi UU KPK lama telah berlaku pada hari itu.
Sedari mula memang KPK reaktif terhadap revisi UU baru itu. Seturut dengan isi UU itu saat masih berwujud draf, KPK sudah memprediksi adanya 26 poin yang dinilai akan melemahkan pemberantasan korupsi.
"Ada kontradiksi antar-beberapa aturan di UU baru tersebut. Ketika kami lihat penjelasannya, cukup jelas. Selain itu KPK juga telah mengidentifikasi adanya 26 poin yang beresiko melemahkan KPK," kata Kabiro Humas KPK Febri Diansyah kepada wartawan, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Padahal, KPK disebut Febri selama ini bekerja dalam kehati-hatian untuk tidak menabrak aturan. Kontradiksi pasal dalam UU baru itu disebut Febri bisa berdampak pada gugatan praperadilan atau upaya hukum lain bila KPK melakukan penyidikan baru.
"KPK tentu saja harus hati-hati dalam memproses perkara korupsi, apalagi ada sejumlah perubahan yang cukup signifikan di UU baru tersebut. Karena itulah KPK terus mengidentifikasi dan analisis secara internal risiko-risiko hukum tersebut. Namun, KPK tetap akan berupaya sekuat tenaga dan pikiran agar pemberantasan korupsi tetap berjalan, meski tak mudah," sebut Febri.
Memangnya apa kontradiksi yang dimaksud?

Death of the KPK Enforcement Engine After the New Law Has Enacted
Nov 7 2019, 08:02 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Practically since October 17, 2019 the KPK has not yet begun a new investigation. The reason is that Law (UU) No. 19 of 2019 which is a new regulation resulting from the revision of the old KPK Law has come into effect on that day.
From the very beginning the KPK was reactive towards the revision of the new law. In accordance with the contents of the Act when it was still in the form of a draft, the KPK had predicted 26 points which were considered to weaken the eradication of corruption.
"There is a contradiction between the several rules in the new law. When we see the explanation, it is quite clear. In addition, the KPK has also identified 26 points that are at risk of weakening the KPK," KPK's Public Relations Commissioner Febri Diansyah told reporters on Wednesday (6/11 / 2019).
In fact, the KPK called Febri has been working in prudence not to break the rules. Article contradictions in the new law called Febri could have an impact on pretrial lawsuits or other legal remedies if the KPK conducts a new investigation.
"The KPK must of course be careful in processing corruption cases, moreover there are a number of significant changes in the new law. That's why the KPK continues to internally identify and analyze these legal risks. However, the KPK will continue to do everything in its power and mind. so that the eradication of corruption continues, even though it is not easy, "said Febri.
What is the contradiction in question?
